summary: This mod adds 3 speed potions to the game to make you walk, run and sprint faster for a short period of time.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds three potions, Potion of Minor, Major and Extreme Speed. Unfortunately I cannot figure out how to make them craftable at the alchemy table so for right now you have to make them in the cooking pot. They can be found under MISC. Anyways hope you like it.

Note: Sometimes the speed effects don\'t wear off like they are supposed to, right now the easiest way to fix this is just load your menu with the tab button and then press it again to get back to your game. I am trying to figure out how to fix this so if you can deal with that then I hope you like it. If not, hopefully I can get a fix soon.

Update 1.2:
made the potions craftable with moon sugar, honey and glow dust

Update 1.1:
fixed dialog in inventory menu

Installation:
1. Copy the esp into your skyrim data folder
2. Load the esp when you start the game

Also if you want to have fun with skooma and alcohol check out my other mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7269
author: Sch518
